                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Collapse Subdiscussion RICHARD WONG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          RICHARD WONG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:40pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Hey Akemi!    To answer your first question, there are actually a lot organizations that are trying to address the problem you posed. Some of government aided, but many, are actually just volunteer organizations that try to go in these schools and offer any support they have to supplement student education. Personally, I was part of a group that taught math/cs, but I knew there were other organizations, even on the Berkeley campus, that go out to nearby schools all throughout California to help and organize the events at the school because of the lack of funding or help the school currently has. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Hey Akemi! 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To answer your first question, there are actually a lot organizations that are trying to address the problem you posed. Some of government aided, but many, are actually just volunteer organizations that try to go in these schools and offer any support they have to supplement student education. Personally, I was part of a group that taught math/cs, but I knew there were other organizations, even on the Berkeley campus, that go out to nearby schools all throughout California to help and organize the events at the school because of the lack of funding or help the school currently has. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Collapse Subdiscussion Inaara Charolia

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Inaara Charolia

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 11:52am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The question our group poses: How might we develop a universal (repeatable) set of tactics or strategies to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand?   After taking a look at the "Thinking in Systems” reading, if we consider systems as having "elements, interconnections, and a function or purpose,” I would argue that our problem sits within the system of social media. I believe some of the core elements of our system are the users (and the varying types of user), the posts, and the (various) features provided on the platform. As the “Frame and Reframe” article and the “Simplifying Complexity” video suggest, I believe it is limiting to only think of problems linearly. I really believe how we frame our solution / process for this ‘how might we’ question is vital because there are a lot of variables in our system that we could potentially test. For example, the different types of users/accounts on Instagram are vastly varied, and we are only looking at one element. This is something we explored as a group—the variety of users and types of accounts we could create—on Instagram, and exploring what frame for our process is most effective in finding a solution to the initial how might we question we’ve posed is interested.    Some things I am still a bit unsure about is, could Instagram itself be considered a system (within the system of social media)? I feel as though I could argue so, but I am not too sure. Additionally, I am curious whether anyone has a really strong understanding or simply has thoughts on the “Simplifying Complexity” video and what some of the tools the presenter may have used to develop his ideas and how these tools can be applied to breaking down our own systems? 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Open in SpeedGrader
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The question our group poses: How might we develop a universal (repeatable) set of tactics or strategies to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            After taking a look at the "Thinking in Systems” reading, if we consider systems as having "elements, interconnections, and a function or purpose,” I would argue that our problem sits within the system of social media. I believe some of the core elements of our system are the users (and the varying types of user), the posts, and the (various) features provided on the platform. As the “Frame and Reframe” article and the “Simplifying Complexity” video suggest, I believe it is limiting to only think of problems linearly. I really believe how we frame our solution / process for this ‘how might we’ question is vital because there are a lot of variables in our system that we could potentially test. For example, the different types of users/accounts on Instagram are vastly varied, and we are only looking at one element. This is something we explored as a group—the variety of users and types of accounts we could create—on Instagram, and exploring what frame for our process is most effective in finding a solution to the initial how might we question we’ve posed is interested. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Some things I am still a bit unsure about is, could Instagram itself be considered a system (within the system of social media)? I feel as though I could argue so, but I am not too sure. Additionally, I am curious whether anyone has a really strong understanding or simply has thoughts on the “Simplifying Complexity” video and what some of the tools the presenter may have used to develop his ideas and how these tools can be applied to breaking down our own systems? 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Collapse Subdiscussion Aaya Abdelshafy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Aaya Abdelshafy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 9:43am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Hi Inaara! I think that social media at large is a system, and that Instagram is a subset within that system. I think that the presenter primarily took a step back and looked at the problem at large. I think that you already possess a lot of the tools that could help you abstract your ideas. The exercises we have been doing class have helped me out a lot, though I still struggle with continuously reframing ideas. You may be able to abstract elements of your system by first thinking about why you are addressing your problem, who it impacts, and who already exists within that system (and related systems). 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Hi Inaara!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                I think that social media at large is a system, and that Instagram is a subset within that system. I think that the presenter primarily took a step back and looked at the problem at large. I think that you already possess a lot of the tools that could help you abstract your ideas. The exercises we have been doing class have helped me out a lot, though I still struggle with continuously reframing ideas. You may be able to abstract elements of your system by first thinking about why you are addressing your problem, who it impacts, and who already exists within that system (and related systems). 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Edited by Aaya Abdelshafy on Mar 16 at 9:43am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Collapse Subdiscussion Alyssa So

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Alyssa So

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 3:17pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Our team’s “how might we?” question has developed to become “How might we develop a universal (repeatable) set of tactics or strategies to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand?”   Initially, when I first heard this project on pitch day, I assumed that it would be a simple matter of getting as many followers as we could using any means, which was my initial “how might we?” question.  After meeting with my group and breaking it down further, however, I realized that it wasn’t as easy as getting all of our friends to follow our new Instagram account for this class.  There were so many more additional components that we had to consider, such as whether or not we want our brand to be a personal brand or a business brand, or what our values were.  For example, did we care about monetizing our account or getting sponsorship from other business brands and creating a partnership?     When we did our research, I came across articles that dealt with the social implications of Instagram and what it meant for self-esteem, self-image, and self-worth.  Did it matter if our followers were true followers, or was it okay to have bot accounts follow us?  How could we measure “true engagement”?  Or would we be satisfied with just having a thousand followers, no matter the source?  What would happen to our followers after this experiment was over?  Would our followers have any emotional ties after following us through our journey or storytelling only to have it abruptly end after this semester?   In class Tuesday, we went deeper into exploring all the ways someone might use Instagram in order to gain insight on the types of stakeholders would have, which ranged from collection-showing (food, animals, interests) to portfolios (photography or design) to blogs/journals (travel) to finstas to strictly reposts (memes).     Ultimately, the core elements of our system include defining the entity (company/individual), the values that we want to show, our tactics for getting to a thousand followers, the social implications of getting a certain number of likes and followers, and our purpose for using Instagram.   Some questions that I’m concerned about still for our project.  Should we all make separate Instagram accounts and try out a set of techniques in order to collect data about which strategies work the best?  Or should we create one single Instagram account and build a story with it and try different techniques with the same account?  Furthermore, what is the most engaging way to utilize content on Instagram?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Our team’s “how might we?” question has developed to become “How might we develop a universal (repeatable) set of tactics or strategies to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand?”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Initially, when I first heard this project on pitch day, I assumed that it would be a simple matter of getting as many followers as we could using any means, which was my initial “how might we?” question.  After meeting with my group and breaking it down further, however, I realized that it wasn’t as easy as getting all of our friends to follow our new Instagram account for this class.  There were so many more additional components that we had to consider, such as whether or not we want our brand to be a personal brand or a business brand, or what our values were.  For example, did we care about monetizing our account or getting sponsorship from other business brands and creating a partnership?  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  When we did our research, I came across articles that dealt with the social implications of Instagram and what it meant for self-esteem, self-image, and self-worth.  Did it matter if our followers were true followers, or was it okay to have bot accounts follow us?  How could we measure “true engagement”?  Or would we be satisfied with just having a thousand followers, no matter the source?  What would happen to our followers after this experiment was over?  Would our followers have any emotional ties after following us through our journey or storytelling only to have it abruptly end after this semester?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  In class Tuesday, we went deeper into exploring all the ways someone might use Instagram in order to gain insight on the types of stakeholders would have, which ranged from collection-showing (food, animals, interests) to portfolios (photography or design) to blogs/journals (travel) to finstas to strictly reposts (memes).  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ultimately, the core elements of our system include defining the entity (company/individual), the values that we want to show, our tactics for getting to a thousand followers, the social implications of getting a certain number of likes and followers, and our purpose for using Instagram.  


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Some questions that I’m concerned about still for our project.  Should we all make separate Instagram accounts and try out a set of techniques in order to collect data about which strategies work the best?  Or should we create one single Instagram account and build a story with it and try different techniques with the same account?  Furthermore, what is the most engaging way to utilize content on Instagram?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Collapse Subdiscussion Luke Zhang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Luke Zhang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 4:43pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Our group’s question is “how might we help designers at Cal through the struggles of the field?” The core elements include the other organizations that are trying to also help, the designers themselves, and the process of becoming a designer. The other organizations are established and recognize that designers need help and a network in order to succeed. They are largely umbrella organizations that offer many services, or very specific clubs. The designers themselves are the very core, because they are the ones we have to help. In order to do anything with this project, we need to understand what the pain points are for them. We don’t want to create something not useful. We need to frame the problem in a way appealing to designers. The actual process designers take is one we have to explore. There is no design major at Cal, so we have to sift through the various clubs and resources, such as the design certificate, to see how a designer would go about starting their career. We don’t quite understand elements such as the process, because it is so individualized due to the lack of resources. How might we uncover this process? We also don’t really know why designers design, as this is also an individual experience. How might we categorize their reasons?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Our group’s question is “how might we help designers at Cal through the struggles of the field?” The core elements include the other organizations that are trying to also help, the designers themselves, and the process of becoming a designer. The other organizations are established and recognize that designers need help and a network in order to succeed. They are largely umbrella organizations that offer many services, or very specific clubs. The designers themselves are the very core, because they are the ones we have to help. In order to do anything with this project, we need to understand what the pain points are for them. We don’t want to create something not useful. We need to frame the problem in a way appealing to designers. The actual process designers take is one we have to explore. There is no design major at Cal, so we have to sift through the various clubs and resources, such as the design certificate, to see how a designer would go about starting their career.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      We don’t quite understand elements such as the process, because it is so individualized due to the lack of resources. How might we uncover this process?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      We also don’t really know why designers design, as this is also an individual experience. How might we categorize their reasons?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Collapse Subdiscussion Dion Dong

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Dion Dong

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 8:35pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To answer your question about the lack of resource and it being individualized, I think that perhaps interviewing more designers first and actually discovering some of their pain points would be a good next step. The two major design clubs on campus BI and InnoD should be great places to start as there are plenty of designers there who would probably be willing to share their insights into the process in order for them to benefit in the future as well.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          To answer your question about the lack of resource and it being individualized, I think that perhaps interviewing more designers first and actually discovering some of their pain points would be a good next step. The two major design clubs on campus BI and InnoD should be great places to start as there are plenty of designers there who would probably be willing to share their insights into the process in order for them to benefit in the future as well.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Collapse Subdiscussion Courtnie Chan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Courtnie Chan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 11:33am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Hi Luke, I think you can step back a bit to help answer your questions. You may not want to ask why designers design, rather why people are passionate about design/aesthetics/etc. If you find that there are similar passions, then you can ponder how to address each element. Courtnie
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go To Parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Hi Luke,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I think you can step back a bit to help answer your questions. You may not want to ask why designers design, rather why people are passionate about design/aesthetics/etc. If you find that there are similar passions, then you can ponder how to address each element.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Courtnie

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Collapse Subdiscussion RICHARD WONG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  RICHARD WONG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:45pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Luke, Your last question might be really hard to answer for some people. Some people just feel the drive to create, or to make things beautiful for whatever reason. I think one approach to your question might be to seriously sit down and ask a LOT of people. Then, you could really try to see what categories of design they fall into, after talking to a lot of people. Hope this helped even slightly!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Luke,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Your last question might be really hard to answer for some people. Some people just feel the drive to create, or to make things beautiful for whatever reason. I think one approach to your question might be to seriously sit down and ask a LOT of people. Then, you could really try to see what categories of design they fall into, after talking to a lot of people. Hope this helped even slightly!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Collapse Subdiscussion Stephanie Luna-Lopez

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Stephanie Luna-Lopez

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 5:47pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    How might we create a classroom tool that emphasizes the value of education and increases education equity?   I found the framing and reframing article interesting because it talks about the importance of analyzing problems in order to find different solutions that may serve different purposes. Before brainstorming solutions, it is important to understand why there is a need for a solution and the factors that must be taken into consideration when coming up with solutions. This is what a system is; a collection of factors that cause the wicked problem and need to be addressed. The core elements of the system that I think sit around our HMW question are learning methods used in the classroom, education policy and standards, and the discrepancy of availability of resources in schools. The article also talks about the role that empathy plays and “entails identifying assumptions, particularly assumptions made about the customers, about how they live their lives and about the culture within which they live and work” which relates to our HWM question in the sense that one of the issues that I found in my research was that teachers’ assumptions about students can affect how they are treated and the amount of work they are given. A teacher that was quoted in an article that I read said,” I don’t give those students [African American boys] the same amount of homework as the rest of the class because they are lazy and probably won’t do it.” This assumption therefore limits the quality of education that those students are receiving and may lead to disadvantages and achievement gaps.   My questions for y’all are: What steps may be taken to address the lack of resources in lower income neighborhoods? How might we promote a sense of empathy in teachers and people in charge of education policy, in an attempt to address our HMW question?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    How might we create a classroom tool that emphasizes the value of education and increases education equity?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I found the framing and reframing article interesting because it talks about the importance of analyzing problems in order to find different solutions that may serve different purposes. Before brainstorming solutions, it is important to understand why there is a need for a solution and the factors that must be taken into consideration when coming up with solutions. This is what a system is; a collection of factors that cause the wicked problem and need to be addressed. The core elements of the system that I think sit around our HMW question are learning methods used in the classroom, education policy and standards, and the discrepancy of availability of resources in schools. The article also talks about the role that empathy plays and “entails identifying assumptions, particularly assumptions made about the customers, about how they live their lives and about the culture within which they live and work” which relates to our HWM question in the sense that one of the issues that I found in my research was that teachers’ assumptions about students can affect how they are treated and the amount of work they are given. A teacher that was quoted in an article that I read said,” I don’t give those students [African American boys] the same amount of homework as the rest of the class because they are lazy and probably won’t do it.” This assumption therefore limits the quality of education that those students are receiving and may lead to disadvantages and achievement gaps.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    My questions for y’all are:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    1. What steps may be taken to address the lack of resources in lower income neighborhoods?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    2. How might we promote a sense of empathy in teachers and people in charge of education policy, in an attempt to address our HMW question?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Collapse Subdiscussion Dion Dong

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Dion Dong

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 8:32pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Our how might we question is “How might we develop a universal (repeatable) set of tactics (strategies?) to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand?”   The core element of this how might we is more specifically the strategies revolved around increasing engagement. So some things that we can look at includes actually identifying the different strategies. Another important aspect to it is after we have identified them, how are we going to be able to test these different strategies. We are thinking that everyone would be running their own instagram blog with different content but because of so, would it be enough to just apply different strategies to different blogs? This can then lead us to our next question which is how are we able to measure and evaluate it after we get all our data. What can we classify as a successful strategy and how are we able to differentiate between chance errors or statistically significant differences.   One question that we wanted to consider is how do we measure engagement. Originally, we wanted to measure engagement through setting a number we want to reach in terms of likes or followers. However we also realised that it may not just be this simple. An account could have many followers or little like, but a lot of likes also because it has a lot of followers. Some other metrics that we thought of would be looking at number of comments but this depends heavily on the content that is being posted. A controversial topic would receive a lot of comments whereas a less controversial topic wouldn’t, therefore it will be very hard to control the reception of the content. What do you guys think are some ways that we can measure our engagement? Like to follower ratio? trends in growth of comments/likes?   Another question that I have is that considering we might be trying out different techniques, e.g. one account would post at certain times versus the other would post in different times, is there a reliable way in which we can measure the impact of the switch in technique considering that there may be fundamental differences between the content of different blogs?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Our how might we question is “How might we develop a universal (repeatable) set of tactics (strategies?) to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand?”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The core element of this how might we is more specifically the strategies revolved around increasing engagement. So some things that we can look at includes actually identifying the different strategies. Another important aspect to it is after we have identified them, how are we going to be able to test these different strategies. We are thinking that everyone would be running their own instagram blog with different content but because of so, would it be enough to just apply different strategies to different blogs? This can then lead us to our next question which is how are we able to measure and evaluate it after we get all our data. What can we classify as a successful strategy and how are we able to differentiate between chance errors or statistically significant differences.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        One question that we wanted to consider is how do we measure engagement. Originally, we wanted to measure engagement through setting a number we want to reach in terms of likes or followers. However we also realised that it may not just be this simple. An account could have many followers or little like, but a lot of likes also because it has a lot of followers. Some other metrics that we thought of would be looking at number of comments but this depends heavily on the content that is being posted. A controversial topic would receive a lot of comments whereas a less controversial topic wouldn’t, therefore it will be very hard to control the reception of the content. What do you guys think are some ways that we can measure our engagement? Like to follower ratio? trends in growth of comments/likes?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Another question that I have is that considering we might be trying out different techniques, e.g. one account would post at certain times versus the other would post in different times, is there a reliable way in which we can measure the impact of the switch in technique considering that there may be fundamental differences between the content of different blogs?
