                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Collapse Subdiscussion Irene Yu

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Irene Yu

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 10:30pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            How might we improve the way people travel by making the process more convenient and creating an experience that's most unique to them? People want to go to places that other people have been but they also want to make their experiences unique. People want to save money on traveling nowadays because of how frequent they are traveling but they don't want to pay for a traveling agency.  How do people do their research on traveling? Why are people spending more on luxurious excursions but paying less on flights?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Open in SpeedGrader
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • How might we improve the way people travel by making the process more convenient and creating an experience that's most unique to them?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • People want to go to places that other people have been but they also want to make their experiences unique. People want to save money on traveling nowadays because of how frequent they are traveling but they don't want to pay for a traveling agency. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • How do people do their research on traveling? Why are people spending more on luxurious excursions but paying less on flights?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Collapse Subdiscussion Alexander Cassidy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Alexander Cassidy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 8:19pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                I have always researched travelling by looking at photos, videos, and online reviews of places online. These places that I want to go to come to me by either word of mouth or by way of their inclusion in advertisements and films. I am always looking to maximise the experience I can have in the location, for me, there is a set distinction between this end location and the way I choose to travel there. Flights are a way to ensure that I have as much budget as possible available for the actual location, a short period of discomfort is worth a better holiday experience.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                I have always researched travelling by looking at photos, videos, and online reviews of places online. These places that I want to go to come to me by either word of mouth or by way of their inclusion in advertisements and films. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                I am always looking to maximise the experience I can have in the location, for me, there is a set distinction between this end location and the way I choose to travel there. Flights are a way to ensure that I have as much budget as possible available for the actual location, a short period of discomfort is worth a better holiday experience.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Collapse Subdiscussion Angela Colback

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Angela Colback

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 11:15pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Our "how might we?" question that my group and I is focused on starting with is "How might we provide a resource or platform for people to reach/ achieve their dreams?"    For now, our question remains open ended since we do not want to be limited with ideas of what we think the solution should be, as that solution may not end up being the best and may not be what others want. The core elements include framing how we define dreams and how do others define their dreams. We want to focus on a future-like aspect of dreams, and something that is achievable. We, then, want to gather from people still looking to achieve their dreams on how they frame their future. From this we hope to draw out the disconnect that may exist from people reaching or not reaching their dreams.  Questions that I have are:  1. How can we come up with a finite solution if everyone has such individualized dreams?  2. Do we need to, then, limit or set boundaries on which subset of people we would focus our question on? 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Our "how might we?" question that my group and I is focused on starting with is "How might we provide a resource or platform for people to reach/ achieve their dreams?" 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  For now, our question remains open ended since we do not want to be limited with ideas of what we think the solution should be, as that solution may not end up being the best and may not be what others want. The core elements include framing how we define dreams and how do others define their dreams. We want to focus on a future-like aspect of dreams, and something that is achievable. We, then, want to gather from people still looking to achieve their dreams on how they frame their future. From this we hope to draw out the disconnect that may exist from people reaching or not reaching their dreams. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Questions that I have are: 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  1. How can we come up with a finite solution if everyone has such individualized dreams? 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  2. Do we need to, then, limit or set boundaries on which subset of people we would focus our question on? 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Collapse Subdiscussion Aaya Abdelshafy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Aaya Abdelshafy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 9:37am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Hi Angela! That is such a lovely idea. I do not think that you need a finite solution per se. I'm not sure if it is possible to create one since everyone's path is different. What might work for one person might not work for the other. Perhaps you could try to provide a large database of resources for different categories of dreams. To address your second question, I do not think that you have to necessarily limit yourself to specific dreams. Perhaps you could tackle a certain demographic though (i.e. recent college graduates). I think that it is possible to find resources for various groups of people. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Hi Angela!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      That is such a lovely idea. I do not think that you need a finite solution per se. I'm not sure if it is possible to create one since everyone's path is different. What might work for one person might not work for the other. Perhaps you could try to provide a large database of resources for different categories of dreams. To address your second question, I do not think that you have to necessarily limit yourself to specific dreams. Perhaps you could tackle a certain demographic though (i.e. recent college graduates). I think that it is possible to find resources for various groups of people. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Collapse Subdiscussion ELVA CHEN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ELVA CHEN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 10:29am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Hi Angela, Thank you for sharing your topic and your questions! I think you do need to focus on either a subset of people or a subset of your problem, because you are right that everyone has very different dreams, and it is way too board -- and almost possible  -- a solution that helps everyone achieve their dream. As for your second question, I think you can gather more insights from your interviews. Maybe you can find a pattern in the demographics that you interviewed, or different demographics can have surprisingly similar dreams and you can focus on a sub-set of the dreams. Hope my response helps!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Hi Angela,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Thank you for sharing your topic and your questions! I think you do need to focus on either a subset of people or a subset of your problem, because you are right that everyone has very different dreams, and it is way too board -- and almost possible  -- a solution that helps everyone achieve their dream. As for your second question, I think you can gather more insights from your interviews. Maybe you can find a pattern in the demographics that you interviewed, or different demographics can have surprisingly similar dreams and you can focus on a sub-set of the dreams. Hope my response helps!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Collapse Subdiscussion NEIL SHANKAR

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            NEIL SHANKAR

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Mar 15, 2017 Mar 15 at 11:34pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            My initial question was "HMW amass 1K followers and present our findings in a way that is replicable and has universal takeaways?" After several rounds of building up and building down, creating a web of abstraction, as well as card sorting as a team, we arrived upon the question "HMW develop a universal (repeatable) set of tactics to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand?" I'll now discuss the key elements reflected in the latter HMW question. Universal - It's important that the takeaways from our collaborative process are replicable and applicable to our stakeholders. Others should be able to apply our findings for their own purposes. Engagement - What's at stake is engagement in a broad sense and not simply the number of Instagram followers we attain. We want to engage our networks with the content we post, and in return have our networks engage with us.  Instagram-only - We decided to limit this study to Instagram to apply a constraint to the problem space. If we were to expand this study in the future, we may include other social networks.  Brand - The term brand came up in discussion, although it wasn't present in any of our initial HMW questions. We're viewing our Instagram content as part of a personal brand. This personal brand may reflect or even be sponsored by a corporate brand, if we are to go down the micro-influencer path.  And now, two questions: - HMW engage with a corporate brand while staying true to our personal brands? - HMW build a brand with strictly reposts and no original content?  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            My initial question was "HMW amass 1K followers and present our findings in a way that is replicable and has universal takeaways?" After several rounds of building up and building down, creating a web of abstraction, as well as card sorting as a team, we arrived upon the question "HMW develop a universal (repeatable) set of tactics to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand?" I'll now discuss the key elements reflected in the latter HMW question.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Universal - It's important that the takeaways from our collaborative process are replicable and applicable to our stakeholders. Others should be able to apply our findings for their own purposes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Engagement - What's at stake is engagement in a broad sense and not simply the number of Instagram followers we attain. We want to engage our networks with the content we post, and in return have our networks engage with us. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Instagram-only - We decided to limit this study to Instagram to apply a constraint to the problem space. If we were to expand this study in the future, we may include other social networks. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Brand - The term brand came up in discussion, although it wasn't present in any of our initial HMW questions. We're viewing our Instagram content as part of a personal brand. This personal brand may reflect or even be sponsored by a corporate brand, if we are to go down the micro-influencer path. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            And now, two questions:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            - HMW engage with a corporate brand while staying true to our personal brands?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            - HMW build a brand with strictly reposts and no original content?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Collapse Subdiscussion Sarah Alsamman

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Sarah Alsamman

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:03am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The HMW question that my team is beginning with is: HMW create a classroom tool that emphasizes the value of education and increases educational equity?  I think the core elements of the system that sit around our HMW begins with society as a whole; its attitude around education and how it is structurally formed in a way that contributes to the classroom level inequity we are trying to address. I think on the same level government (local, state, federal) makes up a system that heavily influences education. Another system is the family/parent system and its relationship with education and the school.  Teachers also make up a very vital system that is direct in its impact.  I have a few questions: More generally, How does distance of system from direct impact on problem change the value we place or attention we give on that system?  More specific to systems that surround our HMW, What are the biggest limitations that teachers as a system face? What do they wish they could change but are currently unable to?  What decides a parents level involvement in there child's education? How involved does a parent need to be (how much does this system matter)? Educational inequity is rooted in structural inequality which makes it such a scary problem to solve.....how can we quell this intimidation? 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The HMW question that my team is beginning with is: HMW create a classroom tool that emphasizes the value of education and increases educational equity? 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                I think the core elements of the system that sit around our HMW begins with society as a whole; its attitude around education and how it is structurally formed in a way that contributes to the classroom level inequity we are trying to address. I think on the same level government (local, state, federal) makes up a system that heavily influences education. Another system is the family/parent system and its relationship with education and the school.  Teachers also make up a very vital system that is direct in its impact. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                I have a few questions:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                More generally,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                How does distance of system from direct impact on problem change the value we place or attention we give on that system? 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                More specific to systems that surround our HMW,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                What are the biggest limitations that teachers as a system face? What do they wish they could change but are currently unable to? 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                What decides a parents level involvement in there child's education? How involved does a parent need to be (how much does this system matter)?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Educational inequity is rooted in structural inequality which makes it such a scary problem to solve.....how can we quell this intimidation? 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Edited by Sarah Alsamman on Mar 16 at 12:09am

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Collapse Subdiscussion Francesca Ledesma

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Francesca Ledesma

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 8:22am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Our group's HMW question is "How might we revolutionize travel by making exploring the world around you simple, accessible, and financially appealing?" The core elements of our system are social media, the travel industry, and the local community. Social media is the main influence for people to travel, explore, and discover new places. The travel industry has rising and falling trends that will ultimately affect our solution space. The local community is our target audience and also the crowd from which we will source information. Two questions: Are you more likely to download an app that helps you explore your local area or an app that offers a simple way to help plan trips and future travel in a city? Why? Describe your ideal travel experience, including planning, organizing, and discovering new places.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Our group's HMW question is "How might we revolutionize travel by making exploring the world around you simple, accessible, and financially appealing?"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The core elements of our system are social media, the travel industry, and the local community. Social media is the main influence for people to travel, explore, and discover new places. The travel industry has rising and falling trends that will ultimately affect our solution space. The local community is our target audience and also the crowd from which we will source information.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Two questions:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    1. Are you more likely to download an app that helps you explore your local area or an app that offers a simple way to help plan trips and future travel in a city? Why?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    2. Describe your ideal travel experience, including planning, organizing, and discovering new places.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Collapse Subdiscussion Shreya Chaganti

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Shreya Chaganti

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 10:31am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. more likely to download something that helps me explore my local area, but is also something that i can use while traveling to explore the area that i'm in. Local/hidden gems are always something that I look up while traveling, and i think having an app dedicated to finding cool things in an area would be very useful.2. ideally, it would be super easy to find the cheapest options for flights and lodging without doing hours and hours of research, but i don't know how plausible that is. in terms of discovering new places, i like looking up hidden gems/things to do in a new city that i'm traveling in.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. more likely to download something that helps me explore my local area, but is also something that i can use while traveling to explore the area that i'm in. Local/hidden gems are always something that I look up while traveling, and i think having an app dedicated to finding cool things in an area would be very useful.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. ideally, it would be super easy to find the cheapest options for flights and lodging without doing hours and hours of research, but i don't know how plausible that is. in terms of discovering new places, i like looking up hidden gems/things to do in a new city that i'm traveling in.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Catalina Biggerstaff

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 8:35am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          HOW MIGHT WE design a service that contributes to the environment and university by altering buildings on campus to become sustainable? The core elements of our system are the well-being of the environment, the university/public buildings and renovating in a cost efficient way. For our project we would like to create a business that would renovate (not demolish) campus buildings that might have a reputation of being wasteful and harmful to the environment.  - What is your least favorite building on campus and why? (Does it not have A/C? Is there no natural lighting?) - Do you consider the building and location of your class when you are registering for courses?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          HOW MIGHT WE design a service that contributes to the environment and university by altering buildings on campus to become sustainable?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The core elements of our system are the well-being of the environment, the university/public buildings and renovating in a cost efficient way.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          For our project we would like to create a business that would renovate (not demolish) campus buildings that might have a reputation of being wasteful and harmful to the environment. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          - What is your least favorite building on campus and why? (Does it not have A/C? Is there no natural lighting?)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          - Do you consider the building and location of your class when you are registering for courses?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Edited by Catalina Biggerstaff on Mar 16 at 8:43am
