                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Hi Courtnie,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I think encouraging administrators to allocate funds to a program outside of regular college classes would be difficult. It does not feel apparent in American education that life skills are an important tenant to be taught. For example, in Japan cooking classes are mandatory for most of their educational career. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Likewise, I believe having a system outside of school where students can follow along by their own time & have easy access to the information provided by the experts would help increase their well-being.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Collapse Subdiscussion Alix Mcmenamy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Alix Mcmenamy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 11:40am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Question: How might we get people motivated to exercise/be healthy? I think the core elements are people who are looking to be more healthy. I think people lack motivation to exercise because it takes too much time and they are not getting immediate results from it. People are not constantly thinking about their health so a product that would remind them of it every day would be beneficial. The core elements of the system come directly from how the consumers would react to our product. What would encourage people to exercise more? What are the different aspects of health that people really need to focus on?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Question: How might we get people motivated to exercise/be healthy?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          I think the core elements are people who are looking to be more healthy. I think people lack motivation to exercise because it takes too much time and they are not getting immediate results from it. People are not constantly thinking about their health so a product that would remind them of it every day would be beneficial. The core elements of the system come directly from how the consumers would react to our product.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          What would encourage people to exercise more?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          What are the different aspects of health that people really need to focus on?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Edited by Alix Mcmenamy on Mar 16 at 11:44am

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Collapse Subdiscussion Sparsh Jain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sparsh Jain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 1pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Thank you Alix for your response. I'd like to address your first question - What would encourage people to exercise more?  In general, I feel like encouraging people to exercise more can be very impersonal, but actually joining in with them could motivate them to exercise more. This is because when they notice that you are also invested in their exercise, they will start to become more motivated. Being supportive, challenging the person, basically being there for them will definitely encourage them to exercise more. I've attached 3 interesting articles that you could take further advice from: https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2015/10/151007110738.htm  http://www.hec.edu/Knowledge/Business-Environment/Social-societal-trends-and-issues/Public-health-How-to-encourage-people-to-lead-a-healthier-lifestyle http://www.ideafit.com/fitness-library/what-motivates-people-to-exercise Hope that helps!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Thank you Alix for your response. I'd like to address your first question - What would encourage people to exercise more? 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In general, I feel like encouraging people to exercise more can be very impersonal, but actually joining in with them could motivate them to exercise more. This is because when they notice that you are also invested in their exercise, they will start to become more motivated. Being supportive, challenging the person, basically being there for them will definitely encourage them to exercise more.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I've attached 3 interesting articles that you could take further advice from:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2015/10/151007110738.htm (Links to an external site.)Links to an external site. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              http://www.hec.edu/Knowledge/Business-Environment/Social-societal-trends-and-issues/Public-health-How-to-encourage-people-to-lead-a-healthier-lifestyle (Links to an external site.)Links to an external site. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              http://www.ideafit.com/fitness-library/what-motivates-people-to-exercise (Links to an external site.)Links to an external site.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Hope that helps!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Collapse Subdiscussion Peggy Zhao

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Peggy Zhao

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 11:45am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Project: How might we comfort shy people when they communicate with others? Are you a shy person? For this question, some people may say “yes” while the other answer “no”. However, from my background research, everyone has possibility to be a “shy” person no matter how talkative or confident he is while integrated into a conversation.So what about imagining some situations that may make you be shy? If you were invited to a party by your friend and when you arrived, you found out there is no one in the house that you are familiar with except your friend who is chatting with others happily. When he saw you and ask you to do an introduction in front of all the participants in the party, will you feel shy? Or what about talking to a cute boy/girl that you have crush on him/her? …… As those circumstances are not for everyone, so you may still have diffrent answers to each of them, but there are some circumstances that make you feel shy, aren't there? However, since the shyness does a complex definition as it’s so emotional and uncontrollable, therefore it is hard for us to imagine a specific setting that will make everyone feel shy. But just as Eric Berlow said in his speech, “the more you step back, embrace complexity, the better chance you have of finding simple answers and it’s often different than the simple answer that you started with.” Let us step back to consider shyness. When you feel shy, what is your inner activity? Is it “what will make others think of me if I said this?” or “what will happen if I do that gesture?” As I ever interviewed the people who are afraid of speaking to others especially in the public, so what they told me about their inner worlds is that they are too sensitive about other’s view. In Donella H. Meadows's book “ Thinking in Systems” , he states that a system is an interconnected set of elements that is coherently organized in a way that achieves something. So for my perspective, the core elements of our system is shy person, community, and the situation. Those elements constitute a dimension that make people feel shy.Question: 1. What are the external conditions that make you to be shy?2. In what circumstance you will not feel nervous about communication?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Project: How might we comfort shy people when they communicate with others?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Are you a shy person? For this question, some people may say “yes” while the other answer “no”. However, from my background research, everyone has possibility to be a “shy” person no matter how talkative or confident he is while integrated into a conversation.So what about imagining some situations that may make you be shy? If you were invited to a party by your friend and when you arrived, you found out there is no one in the house that you are familiar with except your friend who is chatting with others happily. When he saw you and ask you to do an introduction in front of all the participants in the party, will you feel shy? Or what about talking to a cute boy/girl that you have crush on him/her? …… As those circumstances are not for everyone, so you may still have diffrent answers to each of them, but there are some circumstances that make you feel shy, aren't there?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                However, since the shyness does a complex definition as it’s so emotional and uncontrollable, therefore it is hard for us to imagine a specific setting that will make everyone feel shy. But just as Eric Berlow said in his speech, “the more you step back, embrace complexity, the better chance you have of finding simple answers and it’s often different than the simple answer that you started with.”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Let us step back to consider shyness. When you feel shy, what is your inner activity? Is it “what will make others think of me if I said this?” or “what will happen if I do that gesture?” As I ever interviewed the people who are afraid of speaking to others especially in the public, so what they told me about their inner worlds is that they are too sensitive about other’s view. In Donella H. Meadows's book “ Thinking in Systems” , he states that a system is an interconnected set of elements that is coherently organized in a way that achieves something. So for my perspective, the core elements of our system is shy person, community, and the situation. Those elements constitute a dimension that make people feel shy.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Question:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1. What are the external conditions that make you to be shy?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2. In what circumstance you will not feel nervous about communication?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Collapse Subdiscussion Anam Ahsani

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Anam Ahsani

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:03pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Hi Peggy! Thank you for your response! I really liked how you connected the story from Thinking in Systems to make your point clearer. Some external conditions that make me shy include that I want to fit into the crowd that I am a part of. Sometimes when there is a new group of people, I do not feel comfortable with the group as much and do not want to speak! What do you think are conditions that can make a person more extraverted? I am usually more extraverted in most settings, sometimes not classrooms, but can't figure out why! 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Hi Peggy! Thank you for your response! I really liked how you connected the story from Thinking in Systems to make your point clearer. Some external conditions that make me shy include that I want to fit into the crowd that I am a part of. Sometimes when there is a new group of people, I do not feel comfortable with the group as much and do not want to speak! What do you think are conditions that can make a person more extraverted? I am usually more extraverted in most settings, sometimes not classrooms, but can't figure out why! 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Collapse Subdiscussion Sparsh Jain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Sparsh Jain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:55pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Thank you for your response Peggy! I'd like to respond to your first question. Shyness is most likely to occur during unfamiliar situations, though in severe cases it may hinder an individual in their most familiar situations and relationships as well. I've noticed that shy people often avoid the objects of their apprehension in order to keep from feeling uncomfortable and inept; thus, the situations remain unfamiliar and the shyness perpetuates itself. Overall, it seems like it is both a combination of external conditions but also one's apprehension towards that condition that is the cause of being shy. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Go To Parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Thank you for your response Peggy! I'd like to respond to your first question. Shyness is most likely to occur during unfamiliar situations, though in severe cases it may hinder an individual in their most familiar situations and relationships as well. I've noticed that shy people often avoid the objects of their apprehension in order to keep from feeling uncomfortable and inept; thus, the situations remain unfamiliar and the shyness perpetuates itself. Overall, it seems like it is both a combination of external conditions but also one's apprehension towards that condition that is the cause of being shy. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Reply Reply to Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Collapse Subdiscussion Alix Mcmenamy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Alix Mcmenamy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 1:03pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Hi Peggy- For your first question, I think it is important to note the difference between shyness and anxiety. I know many people confuse the two. Shyness could potentially lead to anxiety which could be rather severe. For me, I was considered to be 'shy' when I was younger because I felt nervous around strangers. I couldn't explain why this was and people would always tell me that I would grow out of it. But it is something I've dealt with all of my life and I can now take care of it because I know it is anxiety. I think it is helpful for people to know whether or not external conditions just make them feel a bit uncomfortable or if it is more than that which could be a bigger problem.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Hi Peggy-

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            For your first question, I think it is important to note the difference between shyness and anxiety. I know many people confuse the two. Shyness could potentially lead to anxiety which could be rather severe. For me, I was considered to be 'shy' when I was younger because I felt nervous around strangers. I couldn't explain why this was and people would always tell me that I would grow out of it. But it is something I've dealt with all of my life and I can now take care of it because I know it is anxiety. I think it is helpful for people to know whether or not external conditions just make them feel a bit uncomfortable or if it is more than that which could be a bigger problem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Collapse Subdiscussion Arvin Villadelgado

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Arvin Villadelgado

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 11:50am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I believe my team's how might we is:How might we change the way people explore and adventure? We really wanted to focus on a traveler's experience and their interactions with the localities. We figured that locals would have the most knowledge of fun, cool, or exciting things to do in their area and that they would be willing to share them to travelers/ tourists or even other locals that may not know. Some of the core elements are travelers, local area, local people,  means of travel (can't think of any more but im sure there are more)   What other core elements can you think of in our system? Is there another system that may be at play?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I believe my team's how might we is:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              How might we change the way people explore and adventure?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              We really wanted to focus on a traveler's experience and their interactions with the localities. We figured that locals would have the most knowledge of fun, cool, or exciting things to do in their area and that they would be willing to share them to travelers/ tourists or even other locals that may not know.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Some of the core elements are travelers, local area, local people,  means of travel (can't think of any more but im sure there are more)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              What other core elements can you think of in our system?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Is there another system that may be at play?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Collapse Subdiscussion Jake Trambert

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Jake Trambert

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:31pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Hi Arvin,  I think another core element of your system could be stratifying these smaller elements into different categories. You could do sections for nightlife, morning, and daytime local attractions/etc that will make the operating system user friendly and navigable, a core element of the system in and of itself.  I think this may even be separable into another system; the users interaction with your program/method of delivery of this information to the tourists you are designating this service for. This will probably be very important in the success of your operation, and may be something good to consider from the beginning.  --Jake T 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go To Parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Hi Arvin, 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  I think another core element of your system could be stratifying these smaller elements into different categories. You could do sections for nightlife, morning, and daytime local attractions/etc that will make the operating system user friendly and navigable, a core element of the system in and of itself. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  I think this may even be separable into another system; the users interaction with your program/method of delivery of this information to the tourists you are designating this service for. This will probably be very important in the success of your operation, and may be something good to consider from the beginning. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  --Jake T

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Collapse Subdiscussion Peter Phan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Peter Phan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 11:54am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Our team is still figuring out our concrete how might we question. Although I think we are in the direction of how might we link exercise and energy? How might we use this energy to benefit communities in need if possible? We are unsure if we are leaning towards using it as a motivation for people to exercise or using it as an event for people to create more useable energy for others. Plausibility and framing are still an issue.   I am currently leaning more of creating an event where we could produce energy. For example, they used to have TV marathons to fundraise money, I would want to do something similar where it is an event where people excercise in a way that creates more kinetic energy to provide light in places that may not have it.   Should we lean more towards motivating people to exercise or finding a way to provide more kinetic energy? Is there a way we could balance both ideas better?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go To Topic
