                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Our team is still figuring out our concrete how might we question. Although I think we are in the direction of how might we link exercise and energy? How might we use this energy to benefit communities in need if possible? We are unsure if we are leaning towards using it as a motivation for people to exercise or using it as an event for people to create more useable energy for others. Plausibility and framing are still an issue.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I am currently leaning more of creating an event where we could produce energy. For example, they used to have TV marathons to fundraise money, I would want to do something similar where it is an event where people excercise in a way that creates more kinetic energy to provide light in places that may not have it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Should we lean more towards motivating people to exercise or finding a way to provide more kinetic energy?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Is there a way we could balance both ideas better?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Collapse Subdiscussion Anam Ahsani

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Anam Ahsani

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:01pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Hi Peter! Thank you for your response! I think your ideas sound really interesting. Thinking of an event where energy is being produced sounds like something that people would want to invest in and would make sense in this day and age when everything is about energy conservation and production! I think that making people exercise for the energy is great motivation for people as well. They would be connecting energy in their minds with something productive like exercising as well. There should be more creative ways to exercise and I think you would come up with something leaning in that direction! I think we should be motivating people to exercise as I know personally within my friends we have fluctuating levels of commitment to exercising. It is never a consistent battle or given as much importance. We need to develop this passion now before it is harder to do so.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Go To Parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Delete

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Hi Peter! Thank you for your response! I think your ideas sound really interesting. Thinking of an event where energy is being produced sounds like something that people would want to invest in and would make sense in this day and age when everything is about energy conservation and production! I think that making people exercise for the energy is great motivation for people as well. They would be connecting energy in their minds with something productive like exercising as well. There should be more creative ways to exercise and I think you would come up with something leaning in that direction! I think we should be motivating people to exercise as I know personally within my friends we have fluctuating levels of commitment to exercising. It is never a consistent battle or given as much importance. We need to develop this passion now before it is harder to do so.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Collapse Subdiscussion Anam Ahsani

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Anam Ahsani

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 11:57am
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The "how might we" question that my team is focussed on for the moment is How might we create a brand of fashionable yet sustainable clothing. Our core elements include promoting style while supporting our  brand that is sustainable and helping the environment. We aim to decrease the waste of clothes. The article about Frame and Reframe is especially relevant in this case because we understand that we may have to change our question and business problem as "sometimes we can't solve problems as they are framed, we need an altogether different frame". The article teaches us that finding the best solutions come with critiical and flexible mindsets. The idea is applied with Wrigley's Mint where the company reimagined its product packaging and advertising which resulted in a 13% increase of sales. In this particular case, Wrigleys was focussed on improving revenue in China and the necessary changes on its branding actually improved the country's hold on this target "region". This reminded me that our company clothing line may turn out very different than we had originally intended! After interviewing our various stakeholders (including thrift shop owners, college shoppers) we may very well scrap out our current ideas and rebrand! That is the exciting part of our project right now- we are in the process of collecting stories from stakeholders. These stories "come directly from customers, and allow ys ti surface contradictions...and the success and failures that are core to really understand their needs". The Talking to Humans article also expands on the concept we are trying to hone, by reminding us that "by walking into your customer's shoes you will gain empathy...but you don't want to rely soley on your own experience" (page 17). Talking to people and asking the right questions, in my opinion, provides more valuable information than just observing as a third person that is removed from the shopping experience. Questions: Can you please share a personal experience where you had to alter the scope of your project to fit a customer or audience's needs? How did you frame/reframe your drone project and what were some thought processes that went behind those transitions?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The "how might we" question that my team is focussed on for the moment is How might we create a brand of fashionable yet sustainable clothing. Our core elements include promoting style while supporting our  brand that is sustainable and helping the environment. We aim to decrease the waste of clothes. The article about Frame and Reframe is especially relevant in this case because we understand that we may have to change our question and business problem as "sometimes we can't solve problems as they are framed, we need an altogether different frame". The article teaches us that finding the best solutions come with critiical and flexible mindsets. The idea is applied with Wrigley's Mint where the company reimagined its product packaging and advertising which resulted in a 13% increase of sales. In this particular case, Wrigleys was focussed on improving revenue in China and the necessary changes on its branding actually improved the country's hold on this target "region". This reminded me that our company clothing line may turn out very different than we had originally intended! After interviewing our various stakeholders (including thrift shop owners, college shoppers) we may very well scrap out our current ideas and rebrand! That is the exciting part of our project right now- we are in the process of collecting stories from stakeholders. These stories "come directly from customers, and allow ys ti surface contradictions...and the success and failures that are core to really understand their needs". The Talking to Humans article also expands on the concept we are trying to hone, by reminding us that "by walking into your customer's shoes you will gain empathy...but you don't want to rely soley on your own experience" (page 17). Talking to people and asking the right questions, in my opinion, provides more valuable information than just observing as a third person that is removed from the shopping experience. Questions: Can you please share a personal experience where you had to alter the scope of your project to fit a customer or audience's needs? How did you frame/reframe your drone project and what were some thought processes that went behind those transitions?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Collapse Subdiscussion Elmer Pangilinan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Elmer Pangilinan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:05pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Hi Anam, I have framed & altered the scope of my projects before for a customer's success in many of my design thinking courses. I find it interesting the framing/reframing done during the drone project to very difficult and the transitions were slightly more difficult that regular pivots. Reframing the issue for drones was constrained enough but because of our unfamiliarity & limitations we set before ourselves, the reframing aspect was difficult at first.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go To Parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Hi Anam,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I have framed & altered the scope of my projects before for a customer's success in many of my design thinking courses. I find it interesting the framing/reframing done during the drone project to very difficult and the transitions were slightly more difficult that regular pivots. Reframing the issue for drones was constrained enough but because of our unfamiliarity & limitations we set before ourselves, the reframing aspect was difficult at first.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Collapse Subdiscussion Elmer Pangilinan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Elmer Pangilinan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:02pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                How might we encourage shy people to connect & reduce the threshold for that leap? The core elements around our how might we is deciding how to implement a system that does not force, cause discomfort, or challenge anyways beliefs. Shy people by nature often are reluctant due to fear, judgement, & inability to cause powerful action in social situations. It is then, the challenge of our how might we to discover new methods by which we can allow shy people to ultimately connect with others in some manner that lessens the pain of having to reach out and connect.  So by this, it is the strangers, the people whom they do not know, but which to know are an integrated part of our stakeholder web. It is also the second degree connections that will enable people to connect in some manner. Tackling existing ties is also an option, the ones that individuals feel uncomfortable with. Are there any key players that we are missing from the equation? Do you believe shy people don't want to be forced/challenged or would that opportunity provide a good option for them in social situations?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                How might we encourage shy people to connect & reduce the threshold for that leap?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The core elements around our how might we is deciding how to implement a system that does not force, cause discomfort, or challenge anyways beliefs. Shy people by nature often are reluctant due to fear, judgement, & inability to cause powerful action in social situations. It is then, the challenge of our how might we to discover new methods by which we can allow shy people to ultimately connect with others in some manner that lessens the pain of having to reach out and connect. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                So by this, it is the strangers, the people whom they do not know, but which to know are an integrated part of our stakeholder web. It is also the second degree connections that will enable people to connect in some manner. Tackling existing ties is also an option, the ones that individuals feel uncomfortable with.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Are there any key players that we are missing from the equation?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Do you believe shy people don't want to be forced/challenged or would that opportunity provide a good option for them in social situations?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Collapse Subdiscussion MATT WHITTLE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    MATT WHITTLE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:13pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Yo whats up Shota, I am going to answer your second question in terms of introverts and extroverts. I would consider myself an Extrovert even for me I do not like to speak up in class if I am not 100% sure of my answer in dear of looking like a dummy. Thats is partly just because I know i am not the smartest but if the conversation was something that I am confident in I have no problem speaking up and giving my input. Maybe for most introverts they are more fearful of being judges by their peers. I don't think it is about forcing a challenge for introverts to speak up but giving them time to hear the class conversation and waiting for their moment to speak.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Delete

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Yo whats up Shota,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I am going to answer your second question in terms of introverts and extroverts. I would consider myself an Extrovert even for me I do not like to speak up in class if I am not 100% sure of my answer in dear of looking like a dummy. Thats is partly just because I know i am not the smartest but if the conversation was something that I am confident in I have no problem speaking up and giving my input. Maybe for most introverts they are more fearful of being judges by their peers. I don't think it is about forcing a challenge for introverts to speak up but giving them time to hear the class conversation and waiting for their moment to speak.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Collapse Subdiscussion Lucy Zhang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Lucy Zhang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 6:22pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Hi, I think your groups' HMW question is an issue that should be addressed because I feel like only a handful of people feel comfortable enough in a class to full engage themselves in discussions. (I'm interpreting this HMW as an educational problem? I'm not sure if that's what you're addressing.) Regarding your first question, I think it would be interesting to view this from a developmental standpoint. For example, I know your HMW question focuses on shy people, but have you thought of asking at what point did these people become fearful of judgement in a classroom setting? I think it would be drastically different to implement a one-size-fits all solution for K-12 and onwards. But this is if you're referring to the classroom setting. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Go To Parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Hi,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I think your groups' HMW question is an issue that should be addressed because I feel like only a handful of people feel comfortable enough in a class to full engage themselves in discussions. (I'm interpreting this HMW as an educational problem? I'm not sure if that's what you're addressing.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Regarding your first question, I think it would be interesting to view this from a developmental standpoint. For example, I know your HMW question focuses on shy people, but have you thought of asking at what point did these people become fearful of judgement in a classroom setting? I think it would be drastically different to implement a one-size-fits all solution for K-12 and onwards. But this is if you're referring to the classroom setting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Collapse Subdiscussion MATT WHITTLE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          MATT WHITTLE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:08pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Hi so just right off of the top of the prompt my groups "how might we" is How might we revolutionize the modern workout with the truth? As we went through the mapping exercise that my group did in class we made a very basic how might we map on our poster board that looks nothing like the complex USA task force map talked about in the video. This is partly due to the limited time that we put into the project but even what we designed was large enough to scare someone away. I think something that has been useful in our class is the ability to take everyones unique problem solving brains. From day one we have been trying to figure out our own "problem cycle" (or whatever the actual term is) and Sara's article really breaks down the ideas and thinkings behind it. Our group knows that creating a business or an MVP will be difficult and complex but the best way for us to tackle the project is letting all of our brains think outside the box to really make the best product we can. Two questions I need clarity with are: 1) In reference to the scientist studying sleeping patterns in the Talking to Humans reading, the example really broke the question down to its most basic root. It is good to really dive deep into problems but should all simple problems in life be broken down that far?  2) What are some examples where breaking down a life problem to its root could over complicate things and make your solution worse off?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Edit
