                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Hi Richard

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Thanks for your post. I agree with Justin's response that the best way to go about answering this question is to do market research. I personally would be willing to pay more if I knew that the clothes I were buying were more environmentally friendly. However, researching the market for these products may inform you differently. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Collapse Subdiscussion Sparsh Jain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Sparsh Jain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 12:52pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Our proposed HMW question is as follows: How might we develop a universal (repeatable) set of strategies to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand. I believe that our HMW question sits around the "A Stock with One Reinforcing Loop and One Balancing Loop" system. This is because engagement on social media has a reinforcing loops causing follower and like growth rate to increase, and a balancing loop causing it to die off through various other factors (content, audience interest, relevance, adaptation, etc.). As long as the reinforcing and balancing loops are constant, which are barely constant in the real world, this system has a rather simple behavior. The follower and like rate tends to grow exponentially or die off, and that depends on whether its reinforcing feedback loop determining likes/followers is stronger than the balancing loop determining lack of follower interest, relevance etc. Furthermore, this system definitely applied to our HMW question since there's always tactics which become trends and then die off due to the ever-changing nature (and creativity) of social media in general. Our HMW is definitely a part of the dynamic system group in general - as the reading suggests: "Dynamic systems studies (like our experiment) usually are not designed to predict what will happen. Rather, they’re designed to explore what would happen, if a number of driving factors unfold in a range of different ways."Here are a couple questions that I don't understand about this system in general: 1. Could somebody further explain 'shifting dominance of feedback loops' (Pg. 44, Thinking in Systems)? 2. How do we narrow down the problems we look at in a certain system if there are too many factors that affect the results?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Our proposed HMW question is as follows: How might we develop a universal (repeatable) set of strategies to increase engagement in an Instagram-only brand.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                I believe that our HMW question sits around the "A Stock with One Reinforcing Loop and One Balancing Loop" system. This is because engagement on social media has a reinforcing loops causing follower and like growth rate to increase, and a balancing loop causing it to die off through various other factors (content, audience interest, relevance, adaptation, etc.). As long as the reinforcing and balancing loops are constant, which are barely constant in the real world, this system has a rather simple behavior. The follower and like rate tends to grow exponentially or die off, and that depends on whether its reinforcing feedback loop determining likes/followers is stronger than the balancing loop determining lack of follower interest, relevance etc. Furthermore, this system definitely applied to our HMW question since there's always tactics which become trends and then die off due to the ever-changing nature (and creativity) of social media in general. Our HMW is definitely a part of the dynamic system group in general - as the reading suggests: "Dynamic systems studies (like our experiment) usually are not designed to predict what will happen. Rather, they’re designed to explore what would happen, if a number of driving factors unfold in a range of different ways."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Here are a couple questions that I don't understand about this system in general:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1. Could somebody further explain 'shifting dominance of feedback loops' (Pg. 44, Thinking in Systems)?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2. How do we narrow down the problems we look at in a certain system if there are too many factors that affect the results?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Collapse Subdiscussion Justin Chen

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Justin Chen

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 1:06pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The question our team is focused on is "How might we help ambitious young people reach their career goals and guide them to success?" I think the core elements surrounding this question are: career guidance deciding on a field of study finding a fulfilling balance between work and life gaining a sense of accomplishment creating less uncertainty for the future Of these core elements, I think that the most important is helping people deal with the uncertainty of the future. There are many resources available for students such as advising, mentorship, inspirational talks, and expert panels, but none of these resources can help a student fully control his/her future. As a result, students may continue to feel anxiety and pressure in their everyday lives. Two things in the system I don't fully understand are "What exactly would be the best strategy to help students?" and "What does it take to make someone feel accomplished?"  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The question our team is focused on is "How might we help ambitious young people reach their career goals and guide them to success?"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I think the core elements surrounding this question are:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • career guidance
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • deciding on a field of study
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • finding a fulfilling balance between work and life
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • gaining a sense of accomplishment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • creating less uncertainty for the future

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Of these core elements, I think that the most important is helping people deal with the uncertainty of the future. There are many resources available for students such as advising, mentorship, inspirational talks, and expert panels, but none of these resources can help a student fully control his/her future. As a result, students may continue to feel anxiety and pressure in their everyday lives. Two things in the system I don't fully understand are "What exactly would be the best strategy to help students?" and "What does it take to make someone feel accomplished?"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Reply Reply to Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Collapse Subdiscussion Reed Jones

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Reed Jones

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 1:27pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Hi Justin,  Thanks for your post. I think that providing support often helps people feel accomplished. I think that many times people focus on the end result and not the process. So, supporting someone throughout a process can really help to keep people motivated and, in the end, feel more accomplished.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Hi Justin, 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Thanks for your post. I think that providing support often helps people feel accomplished. I think that many times people focus on the end result and not the process. So, supporting someone throughout a process can really help to keep people motivated and, in the end, feel more accomplished.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Collapse Subdiscussion Reed Jones

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reed Jones

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 1:25pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Gym Class Villains: How Might We Question: How might we create a platform for people to engage with themselves and stay motivated in the idea of "fitness." Core System: For me, the core system that surrounds our how might we question lies within several key words: engage, motivated, and fitness. Our how might we question tackles the overarching idea of "fitness." Deeper in our core system is this idea of engaging. Our how might we question involves engaging, not only the public with the use of our application, but also engaging individuals with their own bodies. Finally, our core system deals with the idea of motivation. Our how might we question aims to find a solution to keeping people motivated and consistent in their daily routines and healthy lifestyle choices.  Questions: 1) What do you define as fitness? Is there more than one definition, or more several factors that play into the idea of 'fitness?' 2) What would keep you motivated while using a smartphone app to support your goals for fitness?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Go To Topic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Gym Class Villains:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          How Might We Question:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          How might we create a platform for people to engage with themselves and stay motivated in the idea of "fitness."

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Core System:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          For me, the core system that surrounds our how might we question lies within several key words: engage, motivated, and fitness. Our how might we question tackles the overarching idea of "fitness." Deeper in our core system is this idea of engaging. Our how might we question involves engaging, not only the public with the use of our application, but also engaging individuals with their own bodies. Finally, our core system deals with the idea of motivation. Our how might we question aims to find a solution to keeping people motivated and consistent in their daily routines and healthy lifestyle choices. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Questions:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1) What do you define as fitness? Is there more than one definition, or more several factors that play into the idea of 'fitness?'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2) What would keep you motivated while using a smartphone app to support your goals for fitness?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reply Reply to Comment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          HTML Editor Rich Content Editor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Collapse Subdiscussion John Ospina

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              John Ospina

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 1:45pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I think one thing that motivates me is achieving goals. Maybe tracking speed change or improvement over time. Also being able to compare yourself to others, not really in a competitive way, but more like to see what your ability is in comparison. Check out Strava, it's an app that I used to use when training on my bike.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Go To Parent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              I think one thing that motivates me is achieving goals. Maybe tracking speed change or improvement over time. Also being able to compare yourself to others, not really in a competitive way, but more like to see what your ability is in comparison. Check out Strava, it's an app that I used to use when training on my bike.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Cancel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Collapse Subdiscussion Regina Madanguit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Regina Madanguit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mar 16, 2017 Mar 16 at 11:53pm
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To me, fitness is caring about your health and wellness. This can manifest itself in not just working out, but if you watch the foods you eat or care for your body in different ways, such as, moisturizing. I know putting on lotion doesn't sound like fitness but I think we should expand our definition of fitness because I think our current definition evokes images of the toned and tan gym rats, and if we don't look like that then we don't practice 'fitness' or 'don't care for our bodies'. I think fitness should overall be more inclusive. I've never used an app to regulate fitness, the closest I've come to using my phone as a workout is watching Blogilates and doing her workouts for the span of a week. But that wasn't a daily encouragement, I put that on myself and that's why it ended so quickly. I do use a sleep tracking app which makes a graph of my night's sleep, which I use pretty much everyday. I think providing graphs and showing your progress and stats is really motivating. I like seeing the steps I take everyday on the Health app. Seeing your bodily functions graphed out as data is really exciting. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Manage Discussion Entry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Go To Parent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Edit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Delete
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Open in SpeedGrader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  To me, fitness is caring about your health and wellness. This can manifest itself in not just working out, but if you watch the foods you eat or care for your body in different ways, such as, moisturizing. I know putting on lotion doesn't sound like fitness but I think we should expand our definition of fitness because I think our current definition evokes images of the toned and tan gym rats, and if we don't look like that then we don't practice 'fitness' or 'don't care for our bodies'. I think fitness should overall be more inclusive. I've never used an app to regulate fitness, the closest I've come to using my phone as a workout is watching Blogilates and doing her workouts for the span of a week. But that wasn't a daily encouragement, I put that on myself and that's why it ended so quickly. I do use a sleep tracking app which makes a graph of my night's sleep, which I use pretty much everyday. I think providing graphs and showing your progress and stats is really motivating. I like seeing the steps I take everyday on the Health app. Seeing your bodily functions graphed out as data is really exciting.

If you don't have a webcam on your computer, you can still record audio-only messages by first installing the Google Video Chat plugin.
